item.title: How to Brush Your Pet's Teeth—Veterinarians Weigh In (2025)
item.description: We talked to pet experts to find out if brushing is just a pet influencer craze, what products to use for oral health, and how to brush safely without losing a finger.

item.title: I Tried the Best At-Home Pet DNA Test Kits on My Two Cats (2025)
item.description: I sent my cats’ saliva to the lab to get health and genetic insights sent to my inbox—with very different results.

item.title: 18 Best Prime Day Pet Deals on Amazon (2025)
